trans-unit.source: Normal quality.
trans-unit.target: 质量正常。

trans-unit.source: Normally that this function does not return until the rendering of all pages is complete. You can connect to the “status-changed” signal on op to obtain some information about the progress of the print operation. Furthermore, it may use a recursive mainloop to show the print dialog.
trans-unit.target: 通常，直到所有页面的渲染完成后，该函数才返回。您可以连接到 op 上的“状态已更改”信号，以获得有关打印操作进度的一些信息。此外，它可以使用递归主循环来显示打印对话框。

trans-unit.source: Normally you use an expander as you would use a frame; you create the child widget and use gtk_expander_set_child() to add it to the expander. When the expander is toggled, it will take care of showing and hiding the child automatically.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您使用扩展器就像使用框架。您可以创建子窗口小部件，并使用 gtk_expander_set_child() 将其添加到扩展器中。切换扩展器后，它将自动显示和隐藏子级。

trans-unit.source: Normally, file filters are used by adding them to a GtkFileChooser (see gtk_file_chooser_add_filter()), but it is also possible to manually use a file filter on any GtkFilterListModel containing GFileInfo objects.
trans-unit.target: 通常，通过将文件过滤器添加到GtkFileChooser来使用文件过滤器（请参阅 gtk_file_chooser_add_filter() ），但是也可以在任何包含GFileInfo对象的GtkFilterListModel上手动使用文件过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the connection between the application and the window will remain until the window is destroyed, but you can explicitly remove it by setting the :application property to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序和窗口之间的连接将一直保持到该窗口被销毁为止，但是您可以通过将：application属性设置为 NULL 来显式删除它。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the connection between the application and the window will remain until the window is destroyed, but you can explicitly remove it by setting the application to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序和窗口之间的连接将一直保持到该窗口被销毁为止，但是您可以通过将 application 设置为 NULL 来显式删除它。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the connection between the application and the window will remain until the window is destroyed, but you can explicitly remove it with gtk_application_remove_window().
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序和窗口之间的连接将一直保持到该窗口被销毁为止，但是您可以使用 gtk_application_remove_window() 显式删除它。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this is the same as “active”, unless the switch is set up for delayed state changes. This function is typically called from a “state-set” signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这与“活动”相同，除非为延迟状态更改设置了开关。通常从“状态集”信号处理程序调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you would pass a full path to gtk_builder_add_from_file() to make the execution of your program independent of the current directory. A common location to install UI descriptions and similar data is /usr/share/appname.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您将向 gtk_builder_add_from_file() 传递完整路径，以使程序的执行独立于当前目录。安装UI描述和类似数据的常见位置是 /usr/share/appname 。

trans-unit.source: Not all streams may support looping, in particular non-seekable streams. Those streams will ignore the loop setting and just end.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有的流都支持循环,特别是不可寻的流。这些流将忽略循环设置,并直接结束。

trans-unit.source: Not represented in the accessibility tree
trans-unit.target: 在无障碍树中没有体现

trans-unit.source: Not useful.
trans-unit.target: 没有用。

trans-unit.source: Note that “left” and “right” here refer to logical direction (left is the toward the start of the buffer); in some languages such as Hebrew the logically-leftmost text is not actually on the left when displayed.
trans-unit.target: 注意这里的“左”和“右”是指逻辑方向（左是指向缓冲区起始处的方向）。在某些语言（例如希伯来语）中，显示时，逻辑上最左侧的文本实际上并不在左侧。

trans-unit.source: Note that <, > and & need to be escaped as <, > and & when used in .ui files.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在.ui文件中使用<，>和＆时，必须将<，>和＆进行转义。

trans-unit.source: Note that 2 notebooks must share a common group identificator (see gtk_notebook_set_group_name()) to allow automatic tabs interchange between them.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，两个笔记本必须共享一个公共的组标识符（请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_group_name() ），以允许它们之间的自动制表符互换。

trans-unit.source: Note that gtk_print_operation_run() can only be called once on a given GtkPrintOperation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， gtk_print_operation_run() 只能在给定的GtkPrintOperation上调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Note that GtkAppChooserDialog does not have any interesting methods of its own. Instead, you should get the embedded GtkAppChooserWidget using gtk_app_chooser_dialog_get_widget() and call its methods if the generic GtkAppChooser interface is not sufficient for your needs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GtkAppChooserDialog本身没有任何有趣的方法。相反，如果通用GtkAppChooser接口不足以满足您的需求，则应该使用 gtk_app_chooser_dialog_get_widget() 获取嵌入式GtkAppChooserWidget，并调用其方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that “expression” must be set for search to work.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须设置“表达式”才能使搜索生效。

trans-unit.source: Note that GtkFileChooserDialog does not have any methods of its own. Instead, you should use the functions that work on a GtkFileChooser.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GtkFileChooserDialog没有自己的任何方法。相反，您应该使用对GtkFileChooser起作用的函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that GtkMapListModel may call this function multiple times on the same item, because it may delete items it doesn't need anymore.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GtkMapListModel可能在同一项目上多次调用此函数，因为它可能会删除不再需要的项目。

trans-unit.source: Note that gtk_tree_model_filter_set_modify_func() can only be called once for a given filter model.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于给定的过滤器模型，只能调用一次 gtk_tree_model_filter_set_modify_func() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that gtk_tree_model_filter_set_visible_func() or gtk_tree_model_filter_set_visible_column() can only be called once for a given filter model.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于给定的过滤器模型，只能调用一次 gtk_tree_model_filter_set_visible_func() 或 gtk_tree_model_filter_set_visible_column() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that bindir@ needs to be replaced with the actual path to the binary before this desktop file can be used.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在可以使用此桌面文件之前，需要用二进制文件的实际路径替换 bindir@ 。

trans-unit.source: Note that cell has already to be packed into cell_layout for this to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， cell 已经打包到 cell_layout 中，以使其正常运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that column refers to a column of the current model. The search column is reset to -1 when the model is changed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， column 是指当前模型的列。更改型号后，搜索列将重置为-1。

trans-unit.source: Note that func is called whenever a row is inserted, when it may still be empty. The visible function should therefore take special care of empty rows, like in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，只要插入一行（可能仍然为空），就会调用 func 。因此，可见函数应特别注意空行，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: Note that model is the model that was passed to gtk_entry_completion_set_model().
trans-unit.target: 请注意， model 是传递给 gtk_entry_completion_set_model() 的模型。

trans-unit.source: Note that n_chars is in characters, not in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， n_chars 以字符而不是字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Note that GTK doesn't guarantee that cell renderers will continue to use the same kind of widget for editing in future releases, therefore you should check the type of editable before doing any specific setup, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GTK不保证单元格渲染器将在以后的版本中继续使用相同类型的窗口小部件进行编辑，因此，在执行任何特定的设置之前，应检查 editable 类型，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Note that GTK makes no effort to ensure that model conforms to the item type of self . It assumes that the caller knows what they are doing and have set up an appropriate filter to ensure that item types match.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GTK不会努力确保 model 符合 self 的项目类型。它假定呼叫者知道他们在做什么，并且已经设置了适当的过滤器以确保项目类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: Note that GTK sets a default title of _("About %s") on the dialog window (where %s is replaced by the name of the application, but in order to ensure proper translation of the title, applications should set the title property explicitly when constructing a GtkAboutDialog, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GTK在对话框窗口中将默认标题设置为 _("About %s") （其中％s被应用程序的名称替换，但是为了确保标题的正确翻译，应用程序应设置title属性构造GtkAboutDialog时明确地显示，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Note that GtkBuilder can also be used to construct objects that are not widgets, such as tree models, adjustments, etc. That is the reason the method we use here is called gtk_builder_get_object() and returns a GObject* instead of a GtkWidget*.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GtkBuilder也可以用于构造非小部件的对象，例如树模型，调整等。这就是我们在此使用的方法称为 gtk_builder_get_object() 并返回GObject *而不是GtkWidget *的原因。

trans-unit.source: Note that GtkSpinButton will by default make its entry large enough to accommodate the lower and upper bounds of the adjustment. If this is not desired, the automatic sizing can be turned off by explicitly setting “width-chars” to a value != -1.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，默认情况下，GtkSpinButton将使其条目足够大以容纳调整的上下边界。如果不希望这样，可以通过将“ width-chars”显式设置为值== -1来关闭自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that an assistant needs to end its page flow with a page of type GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_CONFIRM, GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_SUMMARY or GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_PROGRESS to be correct.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是助理需要结束同类型的页的页面流 GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_CONFIRM ， GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_SUMMARY 或 GTK_ASSISTANT_PAGE_PROGRESS 是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Note that any class that installs templates must call gtk_widget_init_template() in the widget’s instance initializer.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，任何安装模板的类都必须在小部件的实例初始化程序中调用 gtk_widget_init_template() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that as soon as you change the model displayed in the tree view, the tree view will immediately cease the editing operating. This means that you most probably want to refrain from changing the model until the combo cell renderer emits the edited or editing_canceled signal.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只要你改变树形视图中显示的模型,树形视图就会立即停止编辑操作,这意味着你很可能不想改变模型,直到组合单元格渲染器发出编辑或editing_canceled信号。这意味着你很可能要避免改变模型,直到组合单元格渲染器发出edited或editing_canceled信号。

trans-unit.source: Note that buttons will only be shown when they are meaningful. E.g. a menu button only appears when the desktop shell does not show the app menu, and a close button only appears on a window that can be closed.
trans-unit.target: 注意,按钮只有在有意义的时候才会显示。如:菜单按钮只有在桌面外壳不显示应用菜单时才会出现,关闭按钮只有在可以关闭的窗口上才会出现。

trans-unit.source: Note that calls to this method must be in sync with the data used for the row functions. For instance, if the list is mirroring some external data set, and *two* rows changed in the external data set then when you call gtk_list_box_row_changed() on the first row the sort function must only read the new data for the first of the two changed rows, otherwise the resorting of the rows will be wrong.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对此方法的调用必须与用于行函数的数据同步。例如，如果列表正在镜像某些外部数据集，并且外部数据集中的*两*行发生了更改，那么当您在第一行上调用 gtk_list_box_row_changed() 时，sort函数必须仅读取两个表中第一行的新数据更改行，否则重新使用行将是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Note that calls to this method must be in sync with the data used for the sorting and filtering functions. For instance, if the list is mirroring some external data set, and *two* children changed in the external data set when you call gtk_flow_box_child_changed() on the first child, the sort function must only read the new data for the first of the two changed children, otherwise the resorting of the children will be wrong.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对此方法的调用必须与用于排序和过滤功能的数据同步。例如，如果列表正在镜像某些外部数据集，并且当您在第一个子代上调用 gtk_flow_box_child_changed() 时，外部数据集中的*两个*子代已更改，则sort函数必须仅读取两个子代中的第一个的新数据换了孩子，否则孩子的求助将是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Note that changing the child visibility of a widget does not queue a resize on the widget. Most of the time, the size of a widget is computed from all visible children, whether or not they are mapped. If this is not the case, the container can queue a resize itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,更改小组件的子代可见性不会在小组件上排队调整大小。大多数情况下,小组件的大小是根据所有可见的子代计算的,无论它们是否被映射。如果不是这种情况,容器可以自己排队调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that commandline arguments are not passed to gtk_init(). All GTK+ functionality that is available via commandline arguments can also be achieved by setting suitable environment variables such as G_DEBUG, so this should not be a big problem. If you absolutely must support GTK+ commandline arguments, you can explicitly call gtk_init() before creating the application instance.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，命令行参数不会传递给 gtk_init() 。通过设置合适的环境变量（例如 G_DEBUG )，也可以通过命令行参数使用所有GTK +功能，因此这不是什么大问题。如果绝对必须支持GTK +命令行参数，则可以在创建应用程序实例之前显式调用 gtk_init() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that due to historical reasons, GtkNotebook refuses to switch to a page unless the child widget is visible. Therefore, it is recommended to show child widgets before adding them to a notebook.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,由于历史原因,GtkNotebook拒绝切换到页面,除非子部件可见。因此,建议在将子部件添加到笔记本之前,先显示子部件。

trans-unit.source: Note that during the signal emissions, changing properties on the GtkListItems passed will not trigger notify signals as the listitem's notifications are frozen. See g_object_freeze_notify() for details.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在发出信号期间，更改传递的GtkListItems的属性不会触发通知信号，因为listitem的通知已冻结。有关详细信息，请参见 g_object_freeze_notify() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if this is FALSE, the user can still initiate a search using the “start-interactive-search” key binding.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使这是 FALSE ，用户仍然可以使用“ start-interactive-search”键绑定启动搜索。

trans-unit.source: Note that for adjustments which are used in a GtkScrollbar, the effective range of allowed values goes from “lower” to “upper” - “page-size”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于在GtkScrollbar中使用的调整，允许值的有效范围从“下”到“上” - “页面大小”。

trans-unit.source: Note that for filters where the strictness is not known, GTK_FILTER_MATCH_SOME is always an acceptable value, even if a filter does match all or no items.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于不知道严格性的过滤器，即使过滤器确实匹配所有项目或不匹配任何项目， GTK_FILTER_MATCH_SOME 始终是可接受的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that functionality or information that is only available by clicking on an icon in an entry may not be accessible at all to users which are not able to use a mouse or other pointing device. It is therefore recommended that any such functionality should also be available by other means, e.g. via the context menu of the entry.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于不能使用鼠标或其他指向装置的用户来说,只有通过点击条目中的图标才能使用的功能或信息可能根本无法访问。因此,建议任何此类功能也应通过其他方式提供,例如通过条目的上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: Note that having can_focus be TRUE is only one of the necessary conditions for being focusable. A widget must also be sensitive and focusable and not have an ancestor that is marked as not can-focus in order to receive input focus.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， can_focus 为 TRUE 只是可聚焦的必要条件之一。小部件还必须敏感且可聚焦，并且没有祖先标记为不能聚焦才能接收输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Note that having focusable be TRUE is only one of the necessary conditions for being focusable. A widget must also be sensitive and can-focus and not have an ancestor that is marked as not can-focus in order to receive input focus.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将 focusable 设为 TRUE 只是可聚焦的必要条件之一。小部件还必须敏感并且可以聚焦，并且没有祖先被标记为不能聚焦才能接收输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Note that if gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() returns TRUE, it means that iter is at the end of the tagged range, but that the character at iter is outside the tagged range. In other words, unlike gtk_text_iter_starts_tag(), if gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() returns TRUE, gtk_text_iter_has_tag() will return FALSE for the same parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() 返回 TRUE ，则意味着 iter 在标记范围的末尾，但是 iter 的字符不在标记范围之内。换句话说，与 gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() 不同，如果 gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() 返回 TRUE ，则 gtk_text_iter_has_tag() 对于相同的参数将返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() returns TRUE, it means that iter is at the beginning of the tagged range, and that the character at iter is inside the tagged range. In other words, unlike gtk_text_iter_ends_tag(), if gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() returns TRUE, gtk_text_iter_has_tag() will also return TRUE for the same parameters.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() 返回 TRUE ，则意味着 iter 在标记范围的开始，并且 iter 的字符在标记范围之内。换句话说，与 gtk_text_iter_ends_tag() 不同，如果 gtk_text_iter_starts_tag() 返回 TRUE ，则 gtk_text_iter_has_tag() 对于相同的参数也将返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if gtk_text_iter_starts_word() returns TRUE, then this function returns TRUE too, since iter points to the first character of the word.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 gtk_text_iter_starts_word() 返回 TRUE ，则此函数也返回 TRUE ，因为 iter 指向单词的第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Note that if iter happens to be the actual cursor position, and there is currently an IM preedit sequence being entered, the returned locations will be adjusted to account for the preedit cursor’s offset within the preedit sequence.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 iter 恰好是实际光标位置，并且当前正在输入IM预编辑序列，则将调整返回的位置以考虑预编辑序列中预编辑光标的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Note that if path is not specified and cell is set and part of a column containing the expander, the tooltip might not show and hide at the correct position. In such cases path must be set to the current node under the mouse cursor for this function to operate correctly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果未指定 path 且设置了 cell ，并且该列是包含扩展器的列的一部分，则工具提示可能不会显示并隐藏在正确的位置。在这种情况下，必须将 path 设置为鼠标光标下的当前节点，此功能才能正常运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that if both “tooltip-text” and “tooltip-markup” are set, the last one wins.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果同时设置了“工具提示文本”和“工具提示标记”，则最后一个赢。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the tree model is backed by an actual tree store (as opposed to a flat list where the mapping to icons is obvious), GtkIconView will only display the first level of the tree and ignore the tree’s branches.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果树模型由实际的树存储支持（与平面列表相对，在平面列表中图标的映射很明显），则GtkIconView将仅显示树的第一级，而忽略树的分支。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your handler runs before the default handler it must not invalidate the location iter (or has to revalidate it). The default signal handler revalidates it to be placed after the inserted anchor .
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的处理程序在默认处理程序之前运行，则它不得使 location 迭代器无效（或必须对其进行重新验证）。默认的信号处理程序将其重新验证为放置在插入的 anchor 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your handler runs before the default handler it must not invalidate the location iter (or has to revalidate it). The default signal handler revalidates it to be placed after the inserted paintable .
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的处理程序在默认处理程序之前运行，则它不得使 location 迭代器无效（或必须对其进行重新验证）。默认的信号处理程序将其重新验证为放置在插入的 paintable 之后。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your handler runs before the default handler it must not invalidate the location iter (or has to revalidate it). The default signal handler revalidates it to point to the end of the inserted text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的处理程序在默认处理程序之前运行，则它不得使 location 迭代器无效（或必须对其进行重新验证）。默认的信号处理程序将其重新验证为指向插入文本的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your handler runs before the default handler it must not invalidate the start and end iters (or has to revalidate them).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的处理程序在默认处理程序之前运行，则它一定不能使 start 和 end 迭代无效（或必须重新验证它们）。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your handler runs before the default handler it must not invalidate the start and end iters (or has to revalidate them). The default signal handler revalidates the start and end iters to both point to the location where text was deleted. Handlers which run after the default handler (see g_signal_connect_after()) do not have access to the deleted text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的处理程序在默认处理程序之前运行，则它一定不能使 start 和 end 迭代无效（或必须重新验证它们）。默认的信号处理程序将重新验证 start 和 end 迭代，使其均指向删除文本的位置。在默认处理程序之后运行的处理程序（请参见 g_signal_connect_after() ）无法访问已删除的文本。

trans-unit.source: Note that in horizontal context GTK_ALIGN_START and GTK_ALIGN_END are interpreted relative to text direction.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在水平上下文中， GTK_ALIGN_START 和 GTK_ALIGN_END 相对于文本方向进行解释。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the above example we would need to cache the heights returned for each row so that we would know what sizes to render the areas for each row. However we would only want to really cache the heights if the request is intended for the layouting widgets real allocation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在上面的例子中,我们需要缓存每行返回的高度,这样我们就可以知道每行要渲染的区域的大小。然而,只有当请求用于布局部件的真实分配时,我们才会想要真正的缓存高度。

trans-unit.source: Note that in this example it’s not important to observe the returned minimum and natural width of the area for each row unless the cell-layouting object is actually interested in the widths of individual rows. The overall width is however stored in the accompanying GtkCellAreaContext object and can be consulted at any time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在此示例中，观察返回的每行区域的最小宽度和自然宽度并不重要，除非单元格布局对象实际上对单个行的宽度感兴趣。但是，整个宽度存储在随附的GtkCellAreaContext对象中，可以随时进行查询。

trans-unit.source: Note that inheritance is defined for individual actions. I.e. even if you insert a group with prefix prefix , actions with the same prefix will still be inherited from the parent, unless the group contains an action with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，继承是为单个操作定义的。即，即使您插入具有前缀 prefix 的组，具有相同前缀的操作仍将从父级继承，除非该组包含具有相同名称的操作。

trans-unit.source: Note that it changes the size request, the size can still be affected by how you pack the widget into containers. If n_chars is -1, the size reverts to the default size.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，它会更改大小请求，但是大小仍然会受到将小部件打包到容器中的方式的影响。如果 n_chars 为-1，则大小恢复为默认大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is probably more common to define your models in the code, and one might consider it a layering violation to specify the content of a list store in a UI definition, data, not presentation, and common wisdom is to separate the two, as far as possible.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,在代码中定义你的模型可能是比较常见的,在UI定义中指定列表存储的内容,可能会被认为是一种分层的违规行为,是数据,而不是表现形式,通常的智慧是尽可能的将两者分开。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is your responsibility to update preexisting offsets when changing the minimum or maximum value. GTK will simply clamp them to the new range.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当改变最小或最大值时,更新预先存在的偏移量是您的责任。GTK会简单地将它们钳制在新的范围内。

trans-unit.source: Note that items added via “items-changed” may already be selected and no “selection-changed” will be emitted for them. So to track which items are selected, it is necessary to listen to both signals.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可能已经选择了通过“更改项目”添加的项目，并且不会为它们发出“更改选择”的消息。因此，要跟踪选择了哪些项目，有必要聆听两个信号。

trans-unit.source: Note that nesting is allowed, so if you want more than two alternative, create a new alternative trigger for each option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,嵌套是允许的,所以如果你想要两个以上的选择,请为每个选项创建一个新的替代触发器。

trans-unit.source: Note that no function is mandatory to implement, the default implementation will work fine.
trans-unit.target: 注意,任何函数都不是必须实现的,默认实现即可。

trans-unit.source: Note that no iterator is passed to the signal handler, since the row is already deleted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,没有向信号处理程序传递迭代器,因为该行已经被删除。

trans-unit.source: Note that old versions of the file chooser’s documentation suggested using gtk_file_chooser_set_current_folder() in various situations, with the intention of letting the application suggest a reasonable default folder. This is no longer considered to be a good policy, as now the file chooser is able to make good suggestions on its own. In general, you should only cause the file chooser to show a specific folder when it is appropriate to use gtk_file_chooser_set_file(), i.e. when you are doing a Save As command and you already have a file saved somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在各种情况下，建议使用 gtk_file_chooser_set_current_folder() 来选择文件选择器文档的旧版本，以使应用程序建议一个合理的默认文件夹。不再认为这是一个好策略，因为现在文件选择器可以自行提出好的建议。通常，仅应在适合使用 gtk_file_chooser_set_file() 的情况下，即在执行“另存为”命令并且已经将文件保存在某处时，才使文件选择器显示特定的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Note that only non-contextual sizes of every widget are ever consulted by size groups (since size groups have no knowledge of what size a widget will be allocated in one dimension, it cannot derive how much height a widget will receive for a given width). When grouping widgets that trade height for width in mode GTK_SIZE_GROUP_VERTICAL or GTK_SIZE_GROUP_BOTH: the height for the minimum width will be the requested height for all widgets in the group. The same is of course true when horizontally grouping width for height widgets.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尺寸组仅会查询每个窗口小部件的非上下文尺寸（因为尺寸组不知道将在一个维度上分配窗口小部件的大小，因此无法得出给定宽度的窗口小部件将接收多少高度） 。在以 GTK_SIZE_GROUP_VERTICAL 或 GTK_SIZE_GROUP_BOTH 模式在宽度之间交换高度的窗口小部件分组时：最小宽度的高度将是组中所有窗口小部件的请求高度。当对高度小部件的宽度进行水平分组时，当然也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Note that other GTK widgets will only be able to use the application-specific font if it is present in the font map they use:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,其他GTK小组件只有在它们使用的字体图中出现了特定的字体时才能使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that overlay scrolling can also be globally disabled, with the “gtk-overlay-scrolling” setting.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，也可以使用“ gtk-overlay-scrolling”设置来全局禁用叠加滚动。

trans-unit.source: Note that positions are specified in characters, not bytes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,位置是以字符而非字节来指定的。

trans-unit.source: Note that reusing the same cell renderer is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,不支持重复使用相同的单元格渲染器。

trans-unit.source: Note that rounding to a small number of digits can interfere with the smooth autoscrolling that is built into GtkScale. As an alternative, you can use gtk_scale_set_format_value_func() to format the displayed value yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，舍入到少量数字会干扰GtkScale内置的平滑自动滚动。或者，您可以使用 gtk_scale_set_format_value_func() 自行设置显示值的格式。

trans-unit.source: Note that search requires “expression” to be set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，搜索需要设置“表达式”。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting “autoselect” will cause the unselecting to not work, so it practically makes no sense to set both at the same time the same time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，设置“自动选择”将导致取消选择不起作用，因此在同一时间同时设置两者实际上没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting line wrapping to TRUE does not make the label wrap at its parent container’s width, because GTK widgets conceptually can’t make their requisition depend on the parent container’s size. For a label that wraps at a specific position, set the label’s width using gtk_widget_set_size_request().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将换行设置为 TRUE 并不会使标签换行为其父容器的宽度，因为GTK小部件在概念上不能使它们的请求依赖于父容器的大小。对于缠绕在特定位置的标签，请使用 gtk_widget_set_size_request() 设置标签的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the purpose to GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD or GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN is independent from setting “visibility”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将目的设置为 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD 或 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN 与设置“可见性”无关。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the purpose to GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD or GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN is independent from setting “visibility”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将目的设置为 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD 或 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN 与设置“可见性”无关。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property to a value other than PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE has the side-effect that the label requests only enough space to display the ellipsis "...". In particular, this means that ellipsizing labels do not work well in notebook tabs, unless the GtkNotebook tab-expand child property is set to TRUE. Other ways to set a label's width are gtk_widget_set_size_request() and gtk_label_set_width_chars().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将此属性设置为 PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE 以外的值会产生副作用，即标签仅请求足够的空间来显示省略号“ ...”。特别是，这意味着除非GtkNotebook tab-expand子属性设置为 TRUE ，否则省略标签在笔记本选项卡中不能很好地工作。设置标签宽度的其他方法是 gtk_widget_set_size_request() 和 gtk_label_set_width_chars() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property to a value other than PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE has the side-effect that the progress bar requests only enough space to display the ellipsis ("..."). Another means to set a progress bar's width is gtk_widget_set_size_request().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将此属性设置为 PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE 以外的值会带来副作用，即进度条仅请求足够的空间来显示省略号（“ ...”）。设置进度条宽度的另一种方法是 gtk_widget_set_size_request() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that since fullscreening is ultimately handled by the window manager and happens asynchronously to an application request, you shouldn’t assume the return value of this function changing immediately (or at all), as an effect of calling gtk_window_fullscreen() or gtk_window_unfullscreen().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于全屏显示最终由窗口管理器处理，并且与应用程序请求异步发生，因此，您不应假定此函数的返回值立即（或根本没有）改变，因为调用 gtk_window_fullscreen() 或 gtk_window_unfullscreen() 会产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Note that since maximization is ultimately handled by the window manager and happens asynchronously to an application request, you shouldn’t assume the return value of this function changing immediately (or at all), as an effect of calling gtk_window_maximize() or gtk_window_unmaximize().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于最大化最终是由窗口管理器处理的，并且与应用程序请求异步发生，因此您不应假定此函数的返回值立即（或根本不）发生变化，因为调用 gtk_window_maximize() 或 gtk_window_unmaximize() 会产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Note that size groups only affect the amount of space requested, not the size that the widgets finally receive. If you want the widgets in a GtkSizeGroup to actually be the same size, you need to pack them in such a way that they get the size they request and not more. For example, if you are packing your widgets into a table, you would not include the GTK_FILL flag.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，大小组仅影响请求的空间量，而不影响小部件最终接收的大小。如果希望GtkSizeGroup中的小部件实际上具有相同的大小，则需要以使其获得所需大小而不是更大的方式打包它们。例如，如果要将小部件打包到表中，则不包括 GTK_FILL 标志。

trans-unit.source: Note that some actions ignore the passed in flags , widget or args .
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些操作会忽略传入的 flags ， widget 或 args 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_INVALID_FALSE and GTK_ACCESSIBLE_INVALID_TRUE have the same values as FALSE and TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 注意， GTK_ACCESSIBLE_INVALID_FALSE 和 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_INVALID_TRUE 与 FALSE 和 TRUE 具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the GTK_ACCESSIBLE_TRISTATE_FALSE and GTK_ACCESSIBLE_TRISTATE_TRUE have the same values as FALSE and TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 注意， GTK_ACCESSIBLE_TRISTATE_FALSE 和 GTK_ACCESSIBLE_TRISTATE_TRUE 与 FALSE 和 TRUE 具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the cell_editable is created on-demand for the current edit; its lifetime is temporary and does not persist across other edits and/or cells.
trans-unit.target: 注意， cell_editable 是为当前编辑按需创建的；它的生存期是暂时的，不会在其他编辑和/或单元格中持续存在。

trans-unit.source: Note that the child widget has to be visible itself (see gtk_widget_show()) in order to become the visible child of stack .
trans-unit.target: 请注意， child 窗口小部件本身必须是可见的（请参阅 gtk_widget_show() ），以便成为 stack 的可见子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Note that the chooser takes ownership of the filter if it is floating, so you have to ref and sink it if you want to keep a reference.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 chooser 处于浮动状态，它将获得该过滤器的所有权，因此，如果要保留引用，则必须对其进行引用和下沉。

trans-unit.source: Note that the lines parameter starts from 0 and is increased whenever a CSS line break is encountered. (CSS defines the C character sequences "\r\n", "\r", "\n" and "\f" as newlines.) If your document uses different rules for line breaking, you might want run into problems here.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， lines 参数从0开始，每当遇到CSS换行符时都会增加。（CSS将C字符序列“ \ r \ n”，“ \ r”，“ \ n”和“ \ f”定义为换行符。）如果文档使用不同的换行规则，则可能会在这里遇到问题。

trans-unit.source: Note that the CSS syntax has certain special characters to delimit and represent elements in a selector (period, #, >, *...), so using these will make your widget impossible to match by name. Any combination of alphanumeric symbols, dashes and underscores will suffice.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，CSS语法具有某些特殊字符来定界和表示选择器中的元素（句点，＃，>，* ...），因此使用这些特殊字符将使小部件无法按名称进行匹配。字母数字符号，破折号和下划线的任何组合都足够。

trans-unit.source: Note that the GTK inspector can only show GTK internals. It can not understand the application-specific logic of a GTK application. Also, the fact that the GTK inspector is running in the application process limits what it can do. It is meant as a complement to full-blown debuggers and system tracing facilities such as DTrace, not as a replacement.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,GTK检查器只能显示GTK的内部结构。它不能理解GTK应用程序的特定逻辑。另外,GTK检查器在应用程序进程中运行的事实也限制了它能做的事情。它的目的是作为完整的调试器和系统跟踪设施(如 DTrace)的补充,而不是替代。

trans-unit.source: Note that the arguments are hints. If the stream implementation cannot determine the correct values, it is better to err on the side of caution and return TRUE. User interfaces will use those values to determine what controls to show.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，参数是提示。如果流实现无法确定正确的值，则最好谨慎行事并返回 TRUE 。用户界面将使用这些值来确定要显示的控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the box may allow multiple selection, in which case you should use gtk_list_box_selected_foreach() to find all selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该框可能允许多项选择，在这种情况下，应使用 gtk_list_box_selected_foreach() 查找所有选定的行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the cached height in this example really depends on how the layouting widget works. The layouting widget might decide to give every row its minimum or natural height or, if the model content is expected to fit inside the layouting widget without scrolling, it would make sense to calculate the allocation for each row at the time the widget is allocated using gtk_distribute_natural_allocation().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此示例中的缓存高度实际上取决于布局窗口小部件的工作方式。布局小部件可能会决定赋予每一行其最小或自然高度，或者，如果期望模型内容适合滚动小部件中的内容而无需滚动，则在使用分配小部件时计算每一行的分配是有意义的 gtk_distribute_natural_allocation() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the child widget has to be visible itself (see gtk_widget_show()) in order to become the visible child of stack .
trans-unit.target: 请注意，子窗口小部件本身必须是可见的（请参阅 gtk_widget_show() ），以便成为 stack 的可见子窗口。

trans-unit.source: Note that the effect of gdk_surface_beep() can be configured in many ways, depending on the windowing backend and the desktop environment or window manager that is used.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过多种方式配置 gdk_surface_beep() 的效果，具体取决于窗口后端和所使用的桌面环境或窗口管理器。

trans-unit.source: Note that the file must exist, or nothing will be done except for the directory change.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,文件必须存在,否则除了改变目录外,什么都不会做。

trans-unit.source: Note that the initial value of this property depends on the current locale, see also gtk_get_default_language().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性的初始值取决于当前的语言环境，另请参见 gtk_get_default_language() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the initial value of this property depends on the internals of PangoFontDescription.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性的初始值取决于PangoFontDescription的内部。

trans-unit.source: Note that the interpretation of “width-chars” and “max-width-chars” has changed a bit with the introduction of width-for-height geometry management.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，“宽度字符”和“最大宽度字符”的解释随着高度宽度宽度几何管理的引入而有所变化。

trans-unit.source: Note that the layouting widget is responsible for matching the GtkDirectionType values to the way it lays out its cells.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,布局部件负责将GtkDirectionType值与它的单元格布局方式相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Note that the maximum age of the recently used files list is controllable through the “gtk-recent-files-max-age” property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，最近使用的文件列表的最长期限可以通过“ gtk-recent-files-max-age”属性来控制。

trans-unit.source: Note that the opacity is inherited through inclusion — if you set a toplevel to be partially translucent, all of its content will appear translucent, since it is ultimatively rendered on that toplevel. The opacity value itself is not inherited by child widgets (since that would make widgets deeper in the hierarchy progressively more translucent). As a consequence, GtkPopovers and other GtkNative widgets with their own surface will use their own opacity value, and thus by default appear non-translucent, even if they are attached to a toplevel that is translucent.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不透明度是通过包含来继承的-如果将顶层设置为部分半透明，则其所有内容都将显示为半透明，因为它最终是在该顶层上呈现的。不透明度值本身不会被子窗口小部件继承（因为这会使窗口小部件在层次结构中的深度逐渐变得更透明）。结果，具有自己表面的GtkPopovers和其他GtkNative小部件将使用其自己的不透明度值，因此，即使将它们附加到半透明的顶层，默认情况下也将显示为非半透明。

trans-unit.source: Note that the page numbers passed to the “request-page-setup” and “draw-page” signals are 0-based, i.e. if the user chooses to print all pages, the last ::draw-page signal will be for page n_pages - 1.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，传递给“ request-page-setup”和“ draw-page”信号的页码是从0开始的，即，如果用户选择打印所有页面，则最后一个:: draw-page信号将用于第 n_pages 页-1。

trans-unit.source: Note that the position and length are in characters, not in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 注意,位置和长度是以字符为单位,而不是以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Note that the position is in characters, not in bytes. The function updates position to point after the newly inserted text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，位置以字符为单位，而不是以字节为单位。该功能将 position 更新为指向新插入的文本之后的位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that the positions are specified in characters, not bytes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,位置是以字符而非字节来指定的。

trans-unit.source: Note that the purpose is not meant to impose a totally strict rule about allowed characters, and does not replace input validation. It is fine for an on-screen keyboard to let the user override the character set restriction that is expressed by the purpose. The application is expected to validate the entry contents, even if it specified a purpose.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,目的并不是要对允许的字符施加一个完全严格的规则,也不能取代输入验证。对于屏幕键盘来说,让用户覆盖目的所表达的字符集限制是可以的。即使指定了目的,应用程序也要对输入内容进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Note that the return value is NULL until either gtk_print_operation_set_print_settings() or gtk_print_operation_run() have been called.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在 gtk_print_operation_set_print_settings() 或 gtk_print_operation_run() 之前，返回值为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the returned pointer is only valid as long as the sequence is still interpreted by the gesture . If in doubt, you should make a copy of the event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，返回的指针仅在 gesture 仍能解释该 sequence 情况下才有效。如有疑问，请复制该活动。

trans-unit.source: Note that the row may still be empty at this point, since it is a common pattern to first insert an empty row, and then fill it with the desired values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,此时该行可能还是空的,因为通常的模式是先插入空行,然后用所需的值填充。

trans-unit.source: Note that the same effect can be achieved via the GtkActionable api, by using the same action with parameter type and state type 's' for all buttons in the group, and giving each button its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过GtkActionable api达到相同的效果，方法是对组中的所有按钮使用参数类型和状态类型为“ s”的相同动作，并为每个按钮提供自己的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the selection cannot be modified from within this function.
trans-unit.target: 注意,在此功能中不能修改选择。

trans-unit.source: Note that the selection is *persistent* -- if the selected item is removed and re-added in the same “items-changed” emission, it stays selected. In particular, this means that changing the sort order of an underlying sort model will preserve the selection.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，选择是* persistent *（持久性）*-如果删除了所选项目并以相同的“项目更改”发射方式将其重新添加，则该项目保持选中状态。特别是，这意味着更改基础排序模型的排序顺序将保留选择。

trans-unit.source: Note that the signal handler sets the text with gtk_tooltip_set_markup(), so &, <, etc have to be escaped in the text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，信号处理程序使用 gtk_tooltip_set_markup() 设置文本，因此＆，<等必须在文本中转义。

trans-unit.source: Note that the way in which the precision is derived works best if step is a power of ten. If the resulting precision is not suitable for your needs, use gtk_scale_set_digits() to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 step 为10的幂，则得出精度的方法效果最佳。如果结果精度不适合您的需求，请使用 gtk_scale_set_digits() 进行更正。

trans-unit.source: Note that the way in which the precision is derived works best if step is a power of ten. If the resulting precision is not suitable for your needs, use gtk_spin_button_set_digits() to correct it.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 step 为10的幂，则得出精度的方法效果最佳。如果结果精度不适合您的需求，请使用 gtk_spin_button_set_digits() 进行更正。

trans-unit.source: Note that there may still be problems with the support for invisible text, in particular when navigating programmatically inside a buffer containing invisible segments.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对不可见文本的支持可能仍然存在问题,特别是在包含不可见段的缓冲区内进行程序导航时。

trans-unit.source: Note that this can be a different string than what you set with gtk_font_chooser_set_font(), as the font chooser widget may normalize font names and thus return a string with a different structure. For example, “Helvetica Italic Bold 12” could be normalized to “Helvetica Bold Italic 12”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这可能是与您使用 gtk_font_chooser_set_font() 设置的字符串不同的字符串，因为字体选择器小部件可能会规范化字体名称，从而返回具有不同结构的字符串。例如，可以将“ Helvetica Italic Bold 12”标准化为“ Helvetica Bold Italic 12”。

trans-unit.source: Note that this does not release any reference to the object (as opposed to destroying a GtkWindow) because there is no reference from the windowing system to the GtkNativeDialog.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这不会释放对该对象的任何引用（与销毁GtkWindow相对），因为从窗口系统到GtkNativeDialog都没有引用。

trans-unit.source: Note that this environment variable is read by GTK 2.x and GTK 3.x too, which makes it unsuitable for setting it system-wide (or session-wide), since doing so will cause applications using different GTK versions to see incompatible modules.
trans-unit.target: 注意这个环境变量也被GTK 2.x和GTK 3.x所读取,这使得它不适合在系统范围内(或会话范围内)设置,因为这样做会导致使用不同GTK版本的应用程序看到不兼容的模块.

trans-unit.source: Note that this function always works, even when widget is not realized yet.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使尚未实现 widget ，此功能也始终有效。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function behaved differently in versions prior to 2.14 and used to return the label text stripped of embedded underlines indicating mnemonics and Pango markup. This problem can be avoided by fetching the label text directly from the label widget.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个函数在2.14之前的版本中表现不同,它用于返回标签文本,但不包含表示记忆符号和Pango标记的嵌入式下划线。这个问题可以通过直接从标签部件中获取标签文本来避免。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function can only be called when the GtkWidget is attached to a toplevel, since the settings object is specific to a particular GdkDisplay. If you want to monitor the widget for changes in its settings, connect to notify::display.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，仅当GtkWidget连接到顶层时才可以调用此函数，因为设置对象是特定于特定的GdkDisplay的。如果要监视小部件的设置更改，请连接至notify :: display。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function currently requires info_bar to be added to a widget hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能当前需要将 info_bar 添加到小部件层次结构中。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function does not clear the cell renderers, you have to call gtk_cell_layout_clear() yourself if you need to set up different cell renderers for the new model.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能不会清除单元格渲染器，如果需要为新模型设置不同的单元格渲染器，则必须自己调用 gtk_cell_layout_clear() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function is confusingly named. In CSS terms, the value set here is padding.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个函数的名字很混乱。用CSS术语来说,这里设置的值是padding。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function just creates an GtkImage from the pixbuf. The GtkImage created will not react to state changes. Should you want that, you should use gtk_image_new_from_icon_name().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能仅从pixbuf创建一个GtkImage。创建的GtkImage将不会对状态更改做出反应。如果需要，应该使用 gtk_image_new_from_icon_name() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function may use a recursive mainloop to show the page setup dialog. See gtk_print_run_page_setup_dialog_async() if this is a problem.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能可能使用递归主循环来显示页面设置对话框。如果这是一个问题，请参见 gtk_print_run_page_setup_dialog_async() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function requires a suitable cairo context to be associated with the print context.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,该函数需要一个合适的cairo上下文与打印上下文相关联。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function returns a guint64, because when all values are set, the return value is G_MAXUINT + 1. Unless you are sure this cannot happen (it can't with GListModel), be sure to use a 64bit type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个函数返回的是一个guint64,因为当所有的值都被设置时,返回值是G_MAXUINT+1。除非你确定不会发生这种情况(GListModel不会),否则一定要使用64位类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function takes orientation and margins into consideration. See gtk_page_setup_get_paper_height().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能考虑了方向和边距。参见 gtk_page_setup_get_paper_height() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function takes orientation and margins into consideration. See gtk_page_setup_get_paper_width().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能考虑了方向和边距。参见 gtk_page_setup_get_paper_width() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function takes orientation, but not margins into consideration. See gtk_page_setup_get_page_height().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能考虑了方向，但没有考虑边距。请参阅 gtk_page_setup_get_page_height() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function takes orientation, but not margins into consideration. See gtk_page_setup_get_page_width().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能考虑了方向，但没有考虑边距。请参阅 gtk_page_setup_get_page_width() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function takes ownership of self . If you want to keep it around, you should gtk_expression_ref() it beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此功能需要对 self 的所有权。如果要保留它，则应事先 gtk_expression_ref() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function uses the currently-computed height of the lines in the text buffer. Line heights are computed in an idle handler; so this function may not have the desired effect if it’s called before the height computations. To avoid oddness, consider using gtk_text_view_scroll_to_mark() which saves a point to be scrolled to after line validation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此函数使用文本缓冲区中当前计算的行高。线高是在空闲处理程序中计算的；因此，如果在高度计算之前调用此函数，可能不会达到预期的效果。为避免出现奇怪情况，请考虑使用 gtk_text_view_scroll_to_mark() ，该方法将保存行验证后要滚动到的点。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function will also return actions defined by parent classes. You can identify those by looking at owner .
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此函数还将返回由父类定义的动作。您可以通过查看 owner 来识别它们。

trans-unit.source: Note that this has nothing to do with the WM_ICON_NAME property which is mentioned in the ICCCM.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这与ICCCM中提到的WM_ICON_NAME属性无关。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is different from gtk_text_view_get_iter_at_location(), which returns cursor locations, i.e. positions between characters.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这与 gtk_text_view_get_iter_at_location() 不同，后者返回光标位置，即字符之间的位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is not very useful for providing default styling for custom style classes - themes are likely to override styling provided at this priority with catch-all * {...} rules.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这对于为自定义样式类提供默认样式不是很有用-主题很可能会使用包罗万象的 * {...} 规则来覆盖以此优先级提供的样式。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is the widget that would have the focus if the root is active; if the root is not focused then gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) will be FALSE for the widget.
trans-unit.target: 注意，如果根是活动的，则这是具有焦点的小部件。如果根未聚焦，则 gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) 对于小部件将为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this may not change the displayed message, if the message at the top of the stack has a different context id.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果堆栈顶部的消息有不同的上下文id,这可能不会改变显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: Note that this means that making an item non-selectable has no influence on the selected state at all. A non-selectable item may still be selected.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这意味着将一个项目变成不可选择的,对所选状态没有任何影响。一个不可选择的项目仍然可以被选中。

trans-unit.source: Note that this means you may not get a ::leave signal even though the focus moves away from the widget, in certain cases (such as when the focus moves from the widget to a descendent). If you are interested in these cases, you can monitor the “is-focus” property for changes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在某些情况下（例如，当焦点从窗口小部件移到后代时），即使焦点从窗口小部件移开，这也可能不会收到:: leave信号。如果您对这些情况感兴趣，则可以监视“ is-focus”属性中的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note that this means you may not get an ::enter signal even though the widget becomes the focus location, in certain cases (such as when the focus moves from a descendent of the widget to the widget itself). If you are interested in these cases, you can monitor the “is-focus” property for changes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在某些情况下（例如，当焦点从小部件的后代移动到小部件本身时），即使小部件成为焦点位置，也可能不会收到:: enter信号。如果您对这些情况感兴趣，则可以监视“ is-focus”属性中的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note that this must be called from a composite widget classes class initializer after calling gtk_widget_class_set_template().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须在调用 gtk_widget_class_set_template() 之后从复合窗口小部件类的类初始化程序中调用它。

trans-unit.source: Note that this only makes sense for pre-paginated documents.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这只对预分页的文档有意义。

trans-unit.source: Note that this position is in characters, not in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这个位置是以字符为单位,而不是以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property describes how to align the lines of text in case there are several of them. The "xalign" property of GtkCellRenderer, on the other hand, sets the horizontal alignment of the whole text.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此属性描述了在行数多的情况下如何对齐文本行。另一方面，GtkCellRenderer的“ xalign”属性设置整个文本的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is confusingly named. In CSS terms, the value set here is padding, and it is applied in addition to the padding from the theme.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这个属性的名字很容易让人混淆。在CSS术语中,这里设置的值是padding,它是在主题的padding之外应用的。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property may be overridden by the “gtk-keynav-use-caret” settings.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，“ gtk-keynav-use-caret”设置可能会覆盖此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that this refers to the model specified in the model property, not the model backing the tree view to which this cell renderer is attached.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这指的是在模型属性中指定的模型,而不是支持此单元格渲染器所连接的树形视图的模型。

trans-unit.source: Note that this signal does not specify the new selection state of the items, they need to be queried manually. It is also not necessary for a model to change the selection state of any of the items in the selection model, though it would be rather useless to emit such a signal.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这个信号并没有指定项目的新选择状态,它们需要手动查询。模型也不需要改变选择模型中任何一个项目的选择状态,尽管发出这样的信号相当无用。

trans-unit.source: Note that this signal is not emitted when rows are reordered by DND, since this is implemented by removing and then reinserting the row.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当行被DND重新排序时,这个信号不会发出,因为这是通过删除然后重新插入行来实现的。

trans-unit.source: Note that this signal is only emitted when the user changes the color. If you need to react to programmatic color changes as well, use the notify::color signal.
trans-unit.target: 注意,这个信号只有在用户改变颜色时才会发出。如果你也需要对程序化的颜色变化做出反应,请使用notify::color信号。

trans-unit.source: Note that this signal is only emitted when the user changes the font. If you need to react to programmatic font changes as well, use the notify::font signal.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个信号只有在用户更改字体时才会发出。如果你也需要对程序化的字体变化做出反应,请使用notify::font信号。

trans-unit.source: Note that this signal may be emitted at any time as the css provider may opt to defer parsing parts or all of the input to a later time than when a loading function was called.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个信号可能会在任何时候发出,因为css提供者可能会选择将部分或全部输入的解析推迟到比加载函数被调用时更晚的时间。

trans-unit.source: Note that this sorter relies on “passthrough” being FALSE as it can only sort GtkTreeListRows.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此排序器仅依靠“ passthrough”为 FALSE ,因为它只能对GtkTreeListRows进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Note that this value is set during print preparation phase (GTK_PRINT_STATUS_PREPARING), so this function should never be called before the data generation phase (GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA). You can connect to the “status-changed” signal and call gtk_print_operation_get_n_pages_to_print() when print status is GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA. This is typically used to track the progress of print operation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此值是在打印准备阶段（ GTK_PRINT_STATUS_PREPARING ）设置的，因此永远不要在数据生成阶段（ GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA ）之前调用此函数。当打印状态为 GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA 时，您可以连接到“状态已更改”信号并调用 gtk_print_operation_get_n_pages_to_print() 。通常用于跟踪打印操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: Note that this value is set during print preparation phase (GTK_PRINT_STATUS_PREPARING), so this value should never be get before the data generation phase (GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA). You can connect to the “status-changed” signal and call gtk_print_operation_get_n_pages_to_print() when print status is GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA. This is typically used to track the progress of print operation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此值是在打印准备阶段（ GTK_PRINT_STATUS_PREPARING ）设置的，因此，在数据生成阶段（ GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA ）之前永远不要获取此值。当打印状态为 GTK_PRINT_STATUS_GENERATING_DATA 时，您可以连接到“状态已更改”信号并调用 gtk_print_operation_get_n_pages_to_print() 。通常用于跟踪打印操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: Note that this will only be necessary in custom buttons, as the assistant flow can be set with gtk_assistant_set_forward_page_func().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这仅在自定义按钮中是必需的，因为可以使用 gtk_assistant_set_forward_page_func() 设置 assistant 流程。

trans-unit.source: Note that to render a symbolic GtkIconPaintable properly (with recoloring), you have to set its icon name on a GtkImage.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，要正确呈现符号GtkIconPaintable（并重新着色），必须在GtkImage上设置其图标名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that unless gtk_builder_cscope_add_callback_symbol() is called for all signal callbacks which are referenced by the loaded XML, this functionality will require that GModule be supported on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除非为加载的XML引用的所有信号回调调用 gtk_builder_cscope_add_callback_symbol() ，否则此功能将要求平台上支持GModule。

trans-unit.source: Note that unlike gtk_widget_is_ancestor(), gtk_widget_get_ancestor() considers widget to be an ancestor of itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，与 gtk_widget_is_ancestor() 不同， gtk_widget_get_ancestor() 认为 widget 是其自身的祖先。

trans-unit.source: Note that using a filter function is incompatible with using a model (see gtk_flow_box_bind_model()).

trans-unit.source: Note that using a filter function is incompatible with using a model (see gtk_list_box_bind_model()).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用过滤器功能与使用模型不兼容（请参阅 gtk_list_box_bind_model() ）。

trans-unit.source: Note that using a model is incompatible with the filtering and sorting functionality in GtkFlowBox. When using a model, filtering and sorting should be implemented by the model.

trans-unit.source: Note that using a model is incompatible with the filtering and sorting functionality in GtkListBox. When using a model, filtering and sorting should be implemented by the model.
trans-unit.target: 注意,使用模型与GtkListBox中的过滤和排序功能不兼容。当使用模型时,过滤和排序应该由模型来实现。

trans-unit.source: Note that using a sort function is incompatible with using a model (see gtk_flow_box_bind_model()).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用排序功能与使用模型不兼容（请参阅 gtk_flow_box_bind_model() ）。

trans-unit.source: Note that using a sort function is incompatible with using a model (see gtk_list_box_bind_model()).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用排序功能与使用模型不兼容（请参阅 gtk_list_box_bind_model() ）。

trans-unit.source: Note that using the same upper and lower bounds for the GtkScale (through the GtkRange methods) will hide the slider itself. This is useful for applications that want to show an undeterminate value on the scale, without changing the layout of the application (such as movie or music players).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对GtkScale使用相同的上限和下限（通过GtkRange方法）将隐藏滑块本身。这对于希望在刻度上显示不确定值的应用程序很有用，而无需更改应用程序的布局（例如电影或音乐播放器）。

trans-unit.source: Note that values will be restricted by upper - page-size if the page-size property is nonzero.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果page-size属性为非零值，则值将受 upper - page-size 限制。

trans-unit.source: Note that widgets that are placed inside a GtkApplicationWindow can also activate these actions, if they implement the GtkActionable interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果放置在GtkApplicationWindow内的小部件实现了GtkActionable接口，它们也可以激活这些动作。

trans-unit.source: Note that you are expected to call this function from your handler when overriding key event handling. This is needed in the case when you need to insert your own key handling between the input method and the default key event handling of the GtkTextView.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您应该在覆盖键事件处理时从处理程序中调用此函数。当您需要在输入方法和GtkTextView的默认键事件处理之间插入自己的键处理时，这是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot call gtk_widget_queue_resize() on a widget from inside its implementation of the GtkWidgetClass::size_allocate virtual method. Calls to gtk_widget_queue_resize() from inside GtkWidgetClass::size_allocate will be silently ignored.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不能从小部件的GtkWidgetClass :: size_allocate虚拟方法的实现内部调用小部件上的 gtk_widget_queue_resize() 。从GtkWidgetClass :: size_allocate内部对 gtk_widget_queue_resize() 的调用将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note that you may get many calls update_header to this for a particular row when e.g. changing things that don’t affect the header. In this case it is important for performance to not blindly replace an existing header with an identical one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当更改例如不影响标题的内容时，您可能会针对特定的行多次调用 update_header 。在这种情况下，对于性能而言，重要的是不要盲目地用相同的头替换现有的头。

trans-unit.source: Note that you must handle the “drag-end” signal if the actions include GDK_ACTION_MOVE.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果动作包含 GDK_ACTION_MOVE ,则必须处理“ drag-end”信号。

trans-unit.source: Note that you probably want to listen for icon theme changes and update the icon. This is usually done by overriding the GtkWidgetClass.css-changed() function.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您可能想听图标主题更改并更新图标。这通常是通过覆盖 GtkWidgetClass.css-changed() 功能。

trans-unit.source: Note that you probably want to set “input-purpose” to GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD or GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN to inform input methods about the purpose of this entry, in addition to setting visibility to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除了将可见性设置为 FALSE 之外，您可能还想将 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD 或 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN 设置为“输入目的”，以告知输入方法有关此条目的目的。

trans-unit.source: Note that you probably want to set “input-purpose” to GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD or GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN to inform input methods about the purpose of this self, in addition to setting visibility to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，除了将可见性设置为 FALSE 之外，您可能还想将 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PASSWORD 或 GTK_INPUT_PURPOSE_PIN 设置为“输入目的”，以告知输入方法有关此自我的目的。

trans-unit.source: Note that you should use gtk_notebook_detach_tab() instead of gtk_notebook_remove_page() if you want to remove the tab from the source notebook as part of accepting a drop. Otherwise, the source notebook will think that the dragged tab was removed from underneath the ongoing drag operation, and will initiate a drag cancel animation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果要作为接受放置的一部分从源笔记本中删除选项卡，则应使用 gtk_notebook_detach_tab() 而不是 gtk_notebook_remove_page() 。否则，源笔记本将认为正在进行的拖动操作下方已删除了已拖动的选项卡，并将启动拖动取消动画。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely full screen afterward, because other entities (e.g. the user or window manager) could unfullscreen it again, and not all window managers honor requests to fullscreen windows.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您之后不应假定该窗口绝对是全屏的，因为其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可能会再次对其进行全屏显示，并且并非所有的窗口管理器都会接受对全屏窗口的请求。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely maximized afterward, because other entities (e.g. the user or window manager) could unmaximize it again, and not all window managers support maximization.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应假定此后一定要最大化窗口，因为其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可能会再次使其最大化，并且并非所有窗口管理器都支持最大化。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely minimized afterward, because the windowing system might not support this functionality; other entities (e.g. the user or the window manager) could unminimize it again, or there may not be a window manager in which case minimization isn’t possible, etc.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应假定此后窗口一定要最小化，因为窗口系统可能不支持此功能。其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可能再次取消最小化，或者可能没有窗口管理器，在这种情况下无法最小化，等等。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely not full screen afterward, because other entities (e.g. the user or window manager) could fullscreen it again, and not all window managers honor requests to unfullscreen windows; normally the window will end up restored to its normal state. Just don’t write code that crashes if not.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应假定此后窗口绝对不是全屏的，因为其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可以再次对它进行全屏显示，并且并非所有的窗口管理器都会接受对非全屏窗口的请求。通常，该窗口最终将恢复到其正常状态。只是不要编写不会崩溃的代码。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely unmaximized afterward, because other entities (e.g. the user or window manager) could maximize it again, and not all window managers honor requests to unmaximize.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应假定此后窗口绝对未最大化，因为其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可以再次将其最大化，并且并非所有窗口管理器都接受取消最大化的请求。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn’t assume the window is definitely unminimized afterward, because the windowing system might not support this functionality; other entities (e.g. the user or the window manager) could minimize it again, or there may not be a window manager in which case minimization isn’t possible, etc.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不应该假定以后肯定没有最小化窗口，因为窗口系统可能不支持此功能。其他实体（例如，用户或窗口管理器）可以再次将其最小化，或者在没有最小化的情况下可能没有窗口管理器，等等。

trans-unit.source: Note that you shouldn't assume the window is definitely full screen afterward, or that the windowing system allows fullscreen windows on any given monitor.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,不要以为窗口之后就一定是全屏的,也不要以为窗口系统允许在任何一台显示器上设置全屏窗口。

trans-unit.source: Note that you will have to escape the < and > characters when specifying triggers in XML files, such as GtkBuilder ui files. Use < instead of < and > instead of >.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您必须转义 < 和 > 在XML文件（例如GtkBuilder ui文件）中指定触发器时输入的字符。使用 < 代替 < 和 > 而不是 > 。

trans-unit.source: Note that, in order to accomplish appropriate arrow visuals, GtkPopover uses custom drawing for the arrow node. This makes it possible for the arrow to change its shape dynamically, but it also limits the possibilities of styling it using CSS. In particular, the arrow gets drawn over the content node's border so they look like one shape, which means that the border-width of the content node and the arrow node should be the same. The arrow also does not support any border shape other than solid, no border-radius, only one border width (border-bottom-width is used) and no box-shadow.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，为了完成适当的箭头视觉效果，GtkPopover使用自定义图形绘制箭头节点。这使得箭头可以动态地更改其形状，但也限制了使用CSS设置其样式的可能性。特别是，箭头在内容节点的边界上绘制，因此它们看起来像一个形状，这意味着内容节点和箭头节点的边界宽度应该相同。除了实心，无边框半径，仅一个边框宽度（使用边框边框宽度）和无框阴影外，箭头还不支持其他边框形状。

trans-unit.source: Note the inherent danger of setting any fixed size - themes, translations into other languages, different fonts, and user action can all change the appropriate size for a given widget. So, it's basically impossible to hardcode a size that will always be correct.
trans-unit.target: 请注意设置任何固定尺寸的固有危险-主题、翻译成其他语言、不同的字体和用户操作都可以改变给定小组件的适当尺寸。所以,基本上不可能硬编码一个永远正确的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Note, when implementing a layout container: a widget’s allocation will be its “adjusted” allocation, that is, the widget’s parent typically calls gtk_widget_size_allocate() with an allocation, and that allocation is then adjusted (to handle margin and alignment for example) before assignment to the widget. gtk_widget_get_allocation() returns the adjusted allocation that was actually assigned to the widget. The adjusted allocation is guaranteed to be completely contained within the gtk_widget_size_allocate() allocation, however.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在实现布局容器时：小部件的分配将是其“调整后的”分配，即，小部件的父级通常使用分配来调用 gtk_widget_size_allocate() ，然后对该分配进行调整（例如以处理边距和对齐方式）分配给小部件。 gtk_widget_get_allocation() 返回实际分配给窗口小部件的调整后的分配。但是，可以确保调整后的分配完全包含在 gtk_widget_size_allocate() 分配中。

trans-unit.source: Note: sequence might not pertain to the group of sequences that were previously triggering recognition on gesture (ie. a just pressed touch sequence that exceeds “n-points”). This situation may be detected by checking through gtk_gesture_handles_sequence().
trans-unit.target: 注意： sequence 可能与先前触发 gesture 识别的序列组无关（即，刚刚按下的触摸序列超过了“ n点”）。通过 gtk_gesture_handles_sequence() 检查可以检测到这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Note: The pos argument is LTR/RTL aware, so callers should be aware too if intending to provide behavior on horizontal edges.
trans-unit.target: 注意： pos 参数可识别LTR / RTL，因此，如果打算在水平边缘提供行为，则调用者也应注意。

trans-unit.target: 注意：解除额外的触摸（例如2触摸手势上的第三触摸）时，也可能会发生这些情况，在这种情况下，该 sequence 与当前的活动触摸不相关，因此请不要依赖于此。是真的。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function was changed in 3.94 not to use out parameters anymore, but return the GIcon directly. See gtk_image_get_icon_size() for a way to get the icon size.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能在3.94中已更改，不再使用参数，而是直接返回GIcon。有关获取图标大小的方法，请参见 gtk_image_get_icon_size() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function was changed in 3.94 not to use out parameters anymore, but return the icon name directly. See gtk_image_get_icon_size() for a way to get the icon size.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能在3.94中已更改，不再使用参数，而是直接返回图标名称。有关获取图标大小的方法，请参见 gtk_image_get_icon_size() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function will yield unexpected results on touchpad gestures. Since there is no correlation between physical and pixel distances, these will look as if constrained in an infinitely small area, rect width and height will thus be 0 regardless of the number of touchpoints.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此功能会在触摸板手势上产生意外结果。由于物理距离和像素距离之间没有相关性，因此看起来似乎限制在无限小的区域内，因此， rect 宽度和高度将为0，而与接触点的数量无关。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is a helper for gtk_image_set_from_paintable(), and you can't get back the exact pixbuf once this is called, only a paintable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是 gtk_image_set_from_paintable() 的帮助程序，调用此方法后您将无法获得确切的pixbuf，只能获取可绘制的像素。

trans-unit.source: Note: This will not succeed unless the printer’s details are available, see gtk_printer_has_details() and gtk_printer_request_details().
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非提供打印机的详细信息，否则此操作将不会成功，请参阅 gtk_printer_has_details() 和 gtk_printer_request_details() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This will not succeed unless the printer's details are available, see gtk_printer_has_details() and gtk_printer_request_details().
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非提供打印机的详细信息，否则此操作将不会成功，请参阅 gtk_printer_has_details() 和 gtk_printer_request_details() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: if a sequence is set early to GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_CLAIMED on GDK_TOUCH_BEGIN/GDK_BUTTON_PRESS (so those events are captured before reaching the event widget, this implies GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE), one similar event will emulated if the sequence changes to GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED. This way event coherence is preserved before event propagation is unstopped again.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在GDK_TOUCH_BEGIN / GDK_BUTTON_PRESS上将序列的早期设置为GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_CLAIMED（因此这些事件是在到达事件窗口小部件之前捕获的，这意味着GTK_PHASE_CAPTURE），则如果序列更改为GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED，则会模拟一个类似的事件。这样，在再次停止事件传播之前，将保留事件一致性。

trans-unit.source: Note: pasting is asynchronous, that is, we’ll ask for the paste data and return, and at some point later after the main loop runs, the paste data will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：粘贴是异步的，也就是说，我们将要求粘贴数据并返回，并且在主循环运行之后的某个时候，将插入粘贴数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: this does not show or hide action_bar in the “visible” sense, so revealing has no effect if “visible” is FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这不会以“可见”的意义显示或隐藏 action_bar ，因此，如果“ visible”为 FALSE ,则显示不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note: this does not show or hide info_bar in the “visible” sense, so revealing has no effect if “visible” is FALSE.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the last argument is -1. This is always done because this is a variable-argument function and it needs to know when to stop processing arguments. It can be used to set the data in any or all columns in a given row.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,最后一个参数是-1.因为这是一个变量参数函数,它需要知道何时停止处理参数。之所以这样做是因为这是一个变量参数函数,它需要知道何时停止处理参数。它可以用来设置给定行中任何一列或所有列的数据。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the user about an input-related error on this widget. If the “gtk-error-bell” setting is TRUE, it calls gdk_surface_beep(), otherwise it does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 通知用户此小部件上与输入有关的错误。如果“ gtk-error-bell”设置为 TRUE ，它将调用 gdk_surface_beep() ，否则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Notify the input method that a change in cursor position has been made. The location is relative to the client window.
trans-unit.target: 通知输入法,光标位置发生了变化。这个位置是相对于客户端窗口而言的。

trans-unit.source: Notify the input method that the widget to which this input context corresponds has gained focus. The input method may, for example, change the displayed feedback to reflect this change.
trans-unit.target: 通知输入方法该输入上下文所对应的小组件已获得焦点。例如,输入法可以改变显示的反馈以反映这一变化。

trans-unit.source: Notify the input method that the widget to which this input context corresponds has lost focus. The input method may, for example, change the displayed feedback or reset the contexts state to reflect this change.

trans-unit.source: Objects can be referred to by their name and by default refer to objects declared in the local XML fragment and objects exposed via gtk_builder_expose_object(). In general, GtkBuilder allows forward references to objects — declared in the local XML; an object doesn’t have to be constructed before it can be referred to. The exception to this rule is that an object has to be constructed before it can be used as the value of a construct-only property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用对象的名称来引用对象，默认情况下，它们是引用在本地XML片段中声明的对象以及通过 gtk_builder_expose_object() 公开的对象。通常，GtkBuilder允许对对象的前向引用（在本地XML中声明）。在引用对象之前不必构造对象。此规则的例外情况是，必须先构造对象，然后才能将其用作仅构造属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Objects may be given a name with the “id” attribute, which allows the application to retrieve them from the builder with gtk_builder_get_object(). An id is also necessary to use the object as property value in other parts of the UI definition. GTK reserves ids starting and ending with ___ (three consecutive underscores) for its own purposes.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用“ id”属性为对象赋予名称，这使应用程序可以使用 gtk_builder_get_object() 从构建器中检索它们。要在UI定义的其他部分将对象用作属性值，也需要一个id。GTK出于自己的目的，保留以 ___ （三个连续的下划线）开头和结尾的id 。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a tree_model and path from value of target type GTK_TYPE_TREE_ROW_DATA.
trans-unit.target: 从目标类型 GTK_TYPE_TREE_ROW_DATA 的值获取 tree_model 和 path 。

trans-unit.source: Obtains an iterator pointing to byte_index within the given line. byte_index must be the start of a UTF-8 character. Note bytes, not characters; UTF-8 may encode one character as multiple bytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取指向给定行中的 byte_index 的迭代器。 byte_index 必须是UTF-8字符的开头。注意字节，而不是字符；UTF-8可以将一个字符编码为多个字节。

trans-unit.source: Obtains an iterator pointing to char_offset within the given line. Note characters, not bytes; UTF-8 may encode one character as multiple bytes.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的行中获取一个指向 char_offset 的迭代器。注意字符，而不是字节；UTF-8可以将一个字符编码为多个字节。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the coordinates where the label will draw the PangoLayout representing the text in the label; useful to convert mouse events into coordinates inside the PangoLayout, e.g. to take some action if some part of the label is clicked. Remember when using the PangoLayout functions you need to convert to and from pixels using PANGO_PIXELS() or PANGO_SCALE.
trans-unit.target: 获取标签将在其上绘制代表标签中文本的PangoLayout的坐标；将鼠标事件转换为PangoLayout内部的坐标很有用，例如，如果单击标签的某些部分，则可以执行某些操作。请记住，在使用PangoLayout函数时，您需要使用 PANGO_PIXELS() 或PANGO_SCALE在像素之间来回转换。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the coordinates where the scale will draw the PangoLayout representing the text in the scale. Remember when using the PangoLayout function you need to convert to and from pixels using PANGO_PIXELS() or PANGO_SCALE.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the current default reading direction. See gtk_widget_set_default_direction().
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的默认读取方向。请参阅 gtk_widget_set_default_direction() 。

trans-unit.source: Obtains the frame clock for a widget. The frame clock is a global “ticker” that can be used to drive animations and repaints. The most common reason to get the frame clock is to call gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time(), in order to get a time to use for animating. For example you might record the start of the animation with an initial value from gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time(), and then update the animation by calling gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time() again during each repaint.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗口小部件的帧时钟。帧时钟是全局“ ticker”，可用于驱动动画和重绘。获得帧时钟的最常见原因是调用 gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time() ，以便获得用于动画的时间。例如，您可以使用 gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time() 的初始值记录动画的开始，然后在每次重新绘制期间通过再次调用 gdk_frame_clock_get_frame_time() 来更新动画。

trans-unit.source: Of course if you are getting the size request for another widget, such as a child widget, you must use gtk_widget_measure(). Otherwise, you would not properly consider widget margins, GtkSizeGroup, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 当然，如果您要获取其他部件（例如子部件）的尺寸要求，则必须使用 gtk_widget_measure() 。否则，您将不会适当考虑小部件边距，GtkSizeGroup等。

trans-unit.source: Of course, GtkWidgetPaintable allows you to monitor widgets for size changes by emitting the “invalidate-size” signal whenever the size of the widget changes as well as for visual changes by emitting the “invalidate-contents” signal whenever the widget changes.
trans-unit.target: 当然，GtkWidgetPaintable允许您通过在控件大小改变时发出“ invalidate-size”信号来监视控件的大小变化，并通过在控件改变时发出“ invalidate-contents”信号来监视视觉变化。

trans-unit.source: Of course, if you are only using models with few items, this is not important and you can treat views like any other widget. But if you use large lists and your performance suffers, you should be aware of this. Views also allow tuning the number of listitems they create such as with gtk_grid_view_set_max_columns(), and developers running into performance problems should definitely study the tradeoffs of those and experiment with them.
trans-unit.target: 当然，如果您仅使用带有少量项目的模型，那么这并不重要，您可以将视图视为任何其他小部件。但是，如果使用大型列表，但性能受到影响，则应注意这一点。视图还允许调整它们创建的列表项的数量，例如使用 gtk_grid_view_set_max_columns() ，并且遇到性能问题的开发人员一定应该研究它们的权衡并进行试验。

trans-unit.source: Of course, in particular for large lists, it is also possible to subclass GtkSorter and provide one's own sorter.
trans-unit.target: 当然，特别是对于大型列表，也可以将GtkSorter子类化并提供自己的分类器。

trans-unit.target: 一旦至少获取了布局小部件的可见区域中的行的区域大小，就可以在 GtkWidgetClass.snapshot() 时间渲染它们。

trans-unit.source: Once the GtkTreeView widget has a model, it will need to know how to display the model. It does this with columns and cell renderers.
trans-unit.target: 一旦GtkTreeView小部件具有模型，它将需要知道如何显示模型。它使用列和单元格渲染器执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Once the Events phase is over, external events are paused and the redraw loop is run. First is the Update phase, where all animations are run to calculate the new state based on the estimated time the next frame will be visible (available via the frame clock). This often involves geometry changes which drive the next phase, Layout. If there are any changes in widget size requirements the new layout is calculated for the widget hierarchy (i.e. sizes and positions for all widgets are determined). Then comes the Paint phase, where we redraw the regions of the window that need redrawing.
trans-unit.target: 事件阶段结束后,外部事件就会暂停,重绘循环就会运行。首先是Update阶段,在这个阶段,所有的动画都会运行,以根据下一帧将可见的估计时间计算新的状态(通过帧时钟获得)。这通常涉及几何形状的变化,这些变化会驱动下一个阶段,即布局。如果有任何变化的widget尺寸要求,新的布局计算的widget层次结构(即所有widget的大小和位置确定)。然后是画图阶段,我们重新绘制需要重新绘制的窗口区域。

trans-unit.source: Once you have chosen your factory and created it, you need to set it on the view widget you want to use it with, such as via gtk_list_view_set_factory(). Reusing factories across different views is allowed, but very uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 选择工厂并创建工厂后，需要在要使用它的视图小部件上进行设置，例如通过 gtk_list_view_set_factory() 。允许在不同的视图之间重用工厂，但这非常罕见。

trans-unit.source: One could say that a statusbar maintains one stack of messages for display purposes, but allows multiple message producers to maintain sub-stacks of the messages they produced (via context ids).
trans-unit.target: 可以说,一个状态栏为了显示的目的维护了一个消息堆栈,但允许多个消息生产者维护他们生产的消息的子堆栈(通过上下文id)。

trans-unit.source: One of the advantages of the new list widgets over GtkTreeViews and cell renderers is that they are fully themable using GTK CSS. This provides a lot of flexibility. The themes that ship with GTK provide a few predefined list styles that can be used in many situations:
trans-unit.target: 与GtkTreeViews和单元格渲染器相比，新的列表窗口小部件的优点之一是，它们可以使用GTK CSS完全使用。这提供了很大的灵活性。GTK附带的主题提供了一些预定义的列表样式，可以在许多情况下使用：

trans-unit.source: One of the cell renderers of icon_view , or NULL.
trans-unit.target: icon_view 的单元格渲染器之一，即 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: One of the important things to remember about text in GTK is that it’s in the UTF-8 encoding. This means that one character can be encoded as multiple bytes. Character counts are usually referred to as offsets, while byte counts are called indexes. If you confuse these two, things will work fine with ASCII, but as soon as your buffer contains multibyte characters, bad things will happen.
trans-unit.target: 关于GTK中的文本，要记住的重要事情之一是它采用UTF-8编码。这意味着一个字符可以被编码为多个字节。字符计数通常称为偏移量，而字节计数称为索引。如果您将二者混淆，则可以使用ASCII正常工作，但是一旦缓冲区包含多字节字符，就会发生不良情况。

trans-unit.source: One of the important things to remember when monitoring the selection of a view is that the “changed” signal is mostly a hint. That is, it may only emit one signal when a range of rows is selected. Additionally, it may on occasion emit a “changed” signal when nothing has happened (mostly as a result of programmers calling select_row on an already selected row).
trans-unit.target: 监视视图的选择时要记住的重要事情之一是“变化”的信号主要是提示。也就是说，当选择的行的范围可以仅发射一个信号。此外，有时什么也没发生（主要是程序员在已选择的行上调用select_row的结果），它有时会发出“已更改”信号。

trans-unit.source: One of the notable features provided by implementations of GtkCellLayout are attributes. Attributes let you set the properties in flexible ways. They can just be set to constant values like regular properties. But they can also be mapped to a column of the underlying tree model with gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes(), which means that the value of the attribute can change from cell to cell as they are rendered by the cell renderer. Finally, it is possible to specify a function with gtk_cell_layout_set_cell_data_func() that is called to determine the value of the attribute for each cell that is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 属性是由GtkCellLayout的实现提供的显着功能之一。通过属性可以灵活地设置属性。可以将它们设置为恒定值，例如常规属性。但是，也可以使用 gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes() 将它们映射到基础树模型的一列，这意味着当由单元格渲染器渲染时，属性的值可以在单元格之间变化。最后，可以使用 gtk_cell_layout_set_cell_data_func() 指定一个函数，该函数将为所呈现的每个单元格确定属性值。

trans-unit.source: Opacity works on both toplevel widgets and child widgets, although there are some limitations: For toplevel widgets, applying opacity depends on the capabilities of the windowing system. On X11, this has any effect only on X displays with a compositing manager, see gdk_display_is_composited(). On Windows and Wayland it should always work, although setting a window’s opacity after the window has been shown may cause some flicker.
trans-unit.target: 不透明性对顶层窗口小部件和子窗口小部件都起作用，尽管存在一些限制：对于顶层窗口小部件，应用不透明性取决于窗口系统的功能。在X11上，这仅对带有合成管理器的X显示器有效，请参见 gdk_display_is_composited() 。在Windows和Wayland上，它应该总是可以工作，尽管在显示窗口后设置窗口的不透明度可能会引起闪烁。
