trans-unit.source: Optionally, a GtkRecentData might contain a UTF-8 string to be used when viewing the item instead of the last component of the URI; a short description of the item; whether the item should be considered private - that is, should be displayed only by the applications that have registered it.
trans-unit.target: （可选）GtkRecentData可能包含在查看项目时使用的UTF-8字符串，而不是URI的最后一个组成部分；项目的简短描述；是否应将该项目视为私有-也就是说，应仅由已注册该项目的应用程序显示该项目。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, it can offer a way to reveal the contents in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 另外,它可以提供一种以清晰的文字揭示内容的方法。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, specify initial text to set in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 可选地,指定要在缓冲区中设置的初始文本。

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: Options

trans-unit.source: Origin should be something like “filename:linenumber” for rc files, or e.g. “XProperty” for other sources.
trans-unit.target: 对于rc文件，原点应类似于“ filename：linenumber”，对于其他源，应类似于“ XProperty”。

trans-unit.source: Ornaments
trans-unit.target: Ornaments

trans-unit.source: Other accelerator mode
trans-unit.target: 其他加速器模式

trans-unit.source: Other style classes that are commonly used with GtkButton include .suggested-action and .destructive-action. In special cases, buttons can be made round by adding the .circular style class.
trans-unit.target: 其他常用于GtkButton的样式类包括.建议-动作和.破坏-动作。在特殊情况下,可以通过添加.circular样式类将按钮做成圆形。

trans-unit.source: Other style classes that may be added to scrollbars inside GtkScrolledWindow include the positional classes (.left, .right, .top, .bottom) and style classes related to overlay scrolling (.overlay-indicator, .dragging, .hovering).
trans-unit.target: 可以添加到GtkScrolledWindow内部的滚动条中的其他样式类包括位置类（.left，.right，.top，.bottom）和与覆盖滚动相关的样式类（.overlay-indicator，.dragging，.hovering）。

trans-unit.source: Other window systems typically put all their functionality in the application itself. With X, each application involves three different programs: the X server, the application (called a client because it’s a client of the X server), and a special client called the window manager.
trans-unit.target: 其他窗口系统通常将所有功能都放在应用程序本身中。使用X，每个应用程序都涉及三个不同的程序：X服务器，该应用程序（由于是X服务器的客户端，所以称为客户端）以及一个称为窗口管理器的特殊客户端。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the handler returns TRUE. In this case, this handler will accept the drop. The handler is responsible for rading the given value and performing the drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 否则，处理程序返回 TRUE 。在这种情况下，此处理程序将接受放置。处理程序负责传递给定的 value 并执行放置操作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the handler returns TRUE. In this case, this handler will accept the drop. The handler must ensure that gdk_drop_finish() is called to let the source know that the drop is done. The call to gdk_drop_finish() must only be done when all data has been received.
trans-unit.target: 否则，处理程序返回 TRUE 。在这种情况下，此处理程序将接受放置。处理程序必须确保调用 gdk_drop_finish() ，以使源知道删除已完成。仅当已收到所有数据时，才必须调用 gdk_drop_finish() 。

trans-unit.source: Our application is beginning to take shape:
trans-unit.target: 我们的应用已初具规模。

trans-unit.source: Our application now looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们的应用程序现在看起来是这样的。

trans-unit.source: Our preferences menu item does not do anything yet, but the Quit menu item is fully functional. Note that it can also be activated by the usual Ctrl-Q shortcut. The shortcut was added with gtk_application_set_accels_for_action().
trans-unit.target: 我们的首选项菜单项尚无任何作用，但“退出”菜单项功能齐全。请注意，也可以通过通常的Ctrl-Q快捷方式激活它。快捷方式是使用 gtk_application_set_accels_for_action() 添加的。

trans-unit.source: Our simple ui file gives the window a title, and puts a GtkStack widget as the main content.
trans-unit.target: 我们简单的ui文件给了窗口一个标题,并把一个GtkStack小部件作为主要内容。

trans-unit.source: Output a C header file declaring a constant NAME with the contents of the icon cache.
trans-unit.target: 输出一个C头文件，声明带有图标高速缓存内容的 NAME 。

trans-unit.source: Outstanding references on a deleted node are not released. This is not possible because the node has already been deleted by the time the row-deleted signal is received.
trans-unit.target: 被删除节点上的未完成引用不会被释放。这是不可能的,因为在收到行删除信号时,该节点已经被删除。

trans-unit.source: Override for height request of the widget, or -1 if natural request should be used.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖小组件的高度请求,如果应使用自然请求,则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Override for width request of the widget, or -1 if natural request should be used.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖widget的宽度请求,如果应该使用自然请求,则覆盖-1。

trans-unit.source: Packs the cell into the beginning of cell_layout . If expand is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which expand is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 将 cell cell_layout 到cell_layout的开头。如果 expand 为 FALSE ，则不会为该 cell 分配过多的空间。 expand 为 TRUE 的单元格之间将平均分配所有未使用的空间。

trans-unit.source: Packs the cell into the beginning of the column. If expand is FALSE, then the cell is allocated no more space than it needs. Any unused space is divided evenly between cells for which expand is TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 将 cell 打包到列的开头。如果 expand 为 FALSE ，则不会为该 cell 分配过多的空间。 expand 为 TRUE 的单元格之间将平均分配所有未使用的空间。

trans-unit.source: Packs the cell into the beginning of cell_layout.
trans-unit.target: 将单元格打包到cell_layout的开头。

trans-unit.source: Parses str which is marked up with the Pango text markup language, setting the label’s text and attribute list based on the parse results.
trans-unit.target: 解析使用Pango文本标记语言标记的 str ，并根据解析结果设置标签的文本和属性列表。

trans-unit.source: Parses str which is marked up with the Pango text markup language, setting the label’s text and attribute list based on the parse results. If characters in str are preceded by an underscore, they are underlined indicating that they represent a keyboard accelerator called a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 解析使用Pango文本标记语言标记的 str ，并根据解析结果设置标签的文本和属性列表。如果 str 中的字符前面带有下划线，则用下划线标记表明它们代表称为助记符的键盘加速器。

trans-unit.source: Parses a file containing a GtkBuilder UI definition and merges it with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的文件，并将其与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a file containing a GtkBuilder UI definition building only the requested objects and merges them with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的文件，该文件仅构建所请求的对象，并将其与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a resource file containing a GtkBuilder UI definition and merges it with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的资源文件，并将其与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a resource file containing a GtkBuilder UI definition building only the requested objects and merges them with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的资源文件，该定义仅构建所请求的对象，并将它们与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a string containing a GtkBuilder UI definition and merges it with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的字符串，并将其与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a string containing a GtkBuilder UI definition building only the requested objects and merges them with the current contents of builder .
trans-unit.target: 解析包含GtkBuilder UI定义的字符串，该定义仅构建所请求的对象，并将其与 builder 的当前内容合并。

trans-unit.source: Parses a string representing an accelerator, similarly to gtk_accelerator_parse() but handles keycodes as well. This is only useful for system-level components, applications should use gtk_accelerator_parse() instead.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_accelerator_parse() 类似，解析表示加速器的字符串，但也处理键码。这仅对系统级组件有用，应用程序应改用 gtk_accelerator_parse() 。

trans-unit.source: Parses a string representing an accelerator. The format looks like “<Control>a” or “<Shift><Alt>F1”.
trans-unit.target: 解析代表加速器的字符串。格式看起来像“ <Control> a”或“ <Shift> <Alt> F1”。

trans-unit.source: Parsing errors are never fatal, so the parsing will resume after the error. Errors may however cause parts of the given data or even all of it to not be parsed at all. So it is a useful idea to check that the parsing succeeds by connecting to this signal.
trans-unit.target: 解析错误从来不是致命的,所以在错误发生后会继续解析。然而,错误可能会导致部分数据甚至全部数据根本没有被解析。因此,通过连接这个信号来检查解析是否成功是一个有用的想法。

trans-unit.source: Particular uses of GtkPopover, such as touch selection popups or magnifiers in GtkEntry or GtkTextView get style classes like .touch-selection or .magnifier to differentiate from plain popovers.
trans-unit.target: GtkPopover的特殊用途，例如GtkEntry或GtkTextView中的触摸选择弹出窗口或放大镜，会获得.touch-selection或.magnifier之类的样式类，以区别于普通弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Passes an activate event to the cell renderer for possible processing. Some cell renderers may use events; for example, GtkCellRendererToggle toggles when it gets a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 将激活事件传递到单元格渲染器以进行可能的处理。一些单元格渲染器可能会使用事件。例如，GtkCellRendererToggle在鼠标单击时切换。

trans-unit.source: Passing NULL does the same as setting the title to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 传递 NULL 与将标题设置为空字符串相同。

trans-unit.source: Passing NULL for parent unsets the current transient window.
trans-unit.target: 传递 NULL 为 parent 会取消电流瞬态窗口。

trans-unit.source: Passing events to the area is as simple as handling events on any normal widget and then passing them to the gtk_cell_area_event() API as they come in. Usually GtkCellArea is only interested in button events, however some customized derived areas can be implemented who are interested in handling other events. Handling an event can trigger the “focus-changed” signal to fire; as well as “add-editable” in the case that an editable cell was clicked and needs to start editing. You can call gtk_cell_area_stop_editing() at any time to cancel any cell editing that is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: 将事件传递到区域就像处理任何普通小部件上的事件然后将它们传递到 gtk_cell_area_event() API一样简单。通常GtkCellArea只对按钮事件感兴趣，但是可以实现一些感兴趣的定制派生区域在处理其他事件时。处理事件会触发“焦点改变”信号触发；以及单击可编辑单元格并需要开始编辑的情况下的“添加可编辑”。您可以随时调用 gtk_cell_area_stop_editing() 取消当前正在进行的任何单元格编辑。

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of a clipboard. If override_location is NULL, the pasted text will be inserted at the cursor position, or the buffer selection will be replaced if the selection is non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴剪贴板的内容。如果 override_location 为 NULL ，则粘贴的文本将插入光标位置，或者如果选择为非空，则将替换缓冲区选择。

trans-unit.source: Pauses playback of the stream. If the stream is not playing, do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 暂停播放该流。如果流没有播放,则什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: Pauses the media stream and marks it as ended. This is a hint only, calls to GtkMediaStream.play() may still happen.
trans-unit.target: 暂停媒体流并将其标记为结束。这只是一个提示,对GtkMediaStream.play()的调用仍然可能发生。

trans-unit.source: People coming from a Windows or MacOS background often find certain aspects of the X Window System surprising. This section introduces some basic X concepts at a high level. For more details, the book most people use is called the “Xlib Programming Manual” by Adrian Nye; this book is volume one in the O’Reilly X Window System series.
trans-unit.target: 来自Windows或MacOS背景的人们经常会发现X Window系统的某些方面令人惊讶。本节从高层次介绍了一些基本的X概念。有关更多详细信息，大多数人使用的书称为Adrian Nye的“ Xlib编程手册”。本书是O'Reilly X Window System系列的第一卷。

trans-unit.source: Performs the appropriate action as if the user hit the delete key with the cursor at the position specified by iter . In the normal case a single character will be deleted, but when combining accents are involved, more than one character can be deleted, and when precomposed character and accent combinations are involved, less than one character will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 就像用户在 iter 指定的位置上将光标移动到Delete键上一样，执行适当的操作。在正常情况下，将删除单个字符，但是当涉及组合重音符号时，可以删除多个字符，而当涉及预组合字符和重音符号组合时，将删除少于一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Pops popover down.This is different than a gtk_widget_hide() call in that it shows the popover with a transition. If you want to hide the popover without a transition, use gtk_widget_hide().
trans-unit.target: 入时 popover down.This比不同 gtk_widget_hide() 调用，它示出了与过渡的酥料饼。如果要隐藏弹出窗口而不进行过渡，请使用 gtk_widget_hide() 。

trans-unit.source: Pops popover up. This is different than a gtk_widget_show() call in that it shows the popover with a transition. If you want to show the popover without a transition, use gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 流行 popover 了。这与 gtk_widget_show() 调用不同，因为它显示带有过渡的弹出窗口。如果要显示弹出窗口而不进行过渡，请使用 gtk_widget_show() 。

trans-unit.source: Pops up the menu of combo_box . Note that currently this does not do anything with the device, as it was previously only used for list-mode combo boxes, and those were removed in GTK 4. However, it is retained in case similar functionality is added back later.
trans-unit.target: 弹出 combo_box 菜单。请注意，当前这对设备没有任何作用，因为它以前仅用于列表模式组合框，而在GTK 4中已将其删除。但是，在以后再添加类似功能的情况下，将保留该设置。

trans-unit.source: Prepend a widget to the list. If a sort function is set, the widget will actually be inserted at the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: 将小组件插入到列表中。如果设置了排序功能,小组件将实际插入到计算的位置。

trans-unit.target: 将 text 添加到 combo_box 中存储的字符串列表中。

trans-unit.source: Prepends text to the list of strings stored in combo_box . If id is non-NULL then it is used as the ID of the row.
trans-unit.target: 将 text 添加到 combo_box 中存储的字符串列表中。如果 id 为非 NULL ,则将其用作行的ID。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a new row to list_store . iter will be changed to point to this new row. The row will be empty after this function is called. To fill in values, you need to call gtk_list_store_set() or gtk_list_store_set_value().
trans-unit.target: 在 list_store 之前添加一个新行。 iter 将更改为指向此新行。调用此函数后，该行将为空。要填写值，您需要调用 gtk_list_store_set() 或 gtk_list_store_set_value() 。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a new row to tree_store . If parent is non-NULL, then it will prepend the new row before the first child of parent , otherwise it will prepend a row to the top level. iter will be changed to point to this new row. The row will be empty after this function is called. To fill in values, you need to call gtk_tree_store_set() or gtk_tree_store_set_value().
trans-unit.target: 在 tree_store 中添加新行。如果 parent 为非 NULL ，则它将在 parent 的第一个孩子之前添加新行，否则它将在顶层添加一行。 iter 将更改为指向此新行。调用此函数后，该行将为空。要填写值，您需要调用 gtk_tree_store_set() 或 gtk_tree_store_set_value() 。

trans-unit.source: Presents a window to the user in response to a user interaction. The timestamp should be gathered when the window was requested to be shown (when clicking a link for example), rather than once the window is ready to be shown.
trans-unit.target: 响应用户交互,向用户展示一个窗口。时间戳应在请求显示窗口时收集(例如,点击链接时),而不是在窗口准备显示时收集。

trans-unit.source: Presents a window to the user. This function should not be used as when it is called, it is too late to gather a valid timestamp to allow focus stealing prevention to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 向用户展示一个窗口。这个函数不应该被使用,因为当它被调用时,为时已晚,无法收集到有效的时间戳,无法正确地防止焦点窃取。

trans-unit.source: Presents a window to the user. This may mean raising the window in the stacking order, unminimizing it, moving it to the current desktop, and/or giving it the keyboard focus, possibly dependent on the user’s platform, window manager, and preferences.
trans-unit.target: 向用户显示一个窗口。这可能意味着按堆叠顺序升高窗口，最小化窗口，将其移至当前桌面和/或为键盘提供焦点，这可能取决于用户的平台，窗口管理器和首选项。

trans-unit.source: Prevents gtk_init(), gtk_init_check() and gtk_parse_args() from automatically calling setlocale (LC_ALL, ""). You would want to use this function if you wanted to set the locale for your program to something other than the user’s locale, or if you wanted to set different values for different locale categories.
trans-unit.target: 防止 gtk_init() ， gtk_init_check() 和 gtk_parse_args() 自动调用 setlocale (LC_ALL, "") 。如果要将程序的语言环境设置为用户语言环境以外的其他语言，或者要为不同的语言环境类别设置不同的值，则需要使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Queues an animation frame update and adds a callback to be called before each frame. Until the tick callback is removed, it will be called frequently (usually at the frame rate of the output device or as quickly as the application can be repainted, whichever is slower). For this reason, is most suitable for handling graphics that change every frame or every few frames. The tick callback does not automatically imply a relayout or repaint. If you want a repaint or relayout, and aren’t changing widget properties that would trigger that (for example, changing the text of a GtkLabel), then you will have to call gtk_widget_queue_resize() or gtk_widget_queue_draw() yourself.
trans-unit.target: 排队动画帧更新，并在每个帧之前添加要调用的回调。在剔除节拍回调之前，它将被频繁调用（通常以输出设备的帧速率或与应用程序可以重新绘制一样快的速度进行调用，以较慢者为准）。因此，最适合处理每帧或每几帧更改一次的图形。 tick回调不会自动暗示重新布局或重新绘制。如果您想要重新绘制或重新布局，并且不更改会触发该操作的窗口小部件属性（例如，更改GtkLabel的文本），则必须自己调用 gtk_widget_queue_resize() 或 gtk_widget_queue_draw() 。

trans-unit.target: 删除以前已使用 gtk_popover_menu_add_child() 添加的窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a widget that has previously been added with gtk_popover_menu_bar_add_child().
trans-unit.target: 删除以前已使用 gtk_popover_menu_bar_add_child() 添加的窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a window from a GtkWindowGroup.
trans-unit.target: 从GtkWindowGroup移除一个窗口。

trans-unit.source: Removes all constraints from the layout manager.
trans-unit.target: 删除布局管理器中的所有约束。

trans-unit.source: Removes all rows from tree_store
trans-unit.target: 从 tree_store 删除所有行

trans-unit.source: Removes all rows from the list store.
trans-unit.target: 删除列表存储中的所有行。

trans-unit.source: Removes all tags in the range between start and end . Be careful with this function; it could remove tags added in code unrelated to the code you’re currently writing. That is, using this function is probably a bad idea if you have two or more unrelated code sections that add tags.
trans-unit.target: 删除介于 start 和 end 之间范围内的所有标签。注意此功能；它可能会删除添加到与您当前正在编写的代码无关的代码中的标签。也就是说，如果您有两个或更多不相关的代码段来添加标签，那么使用此功能可能不是一个好主意。

trans-unit.source: Removes all the text entries from the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 删除组合框中的所有文本条目。

trans-unit.source: Removes all values from start (inclusive) to start + n_items (exclusive) in self .
trans-unit.target: 从 self 中移除从 start （包括）到 start + n_items （不包括）的所有值。

trans-unit.source: Removes all values from the bitset so that it is empty again.
trans-unit.target: 删除位组中的所有值,使其重新为空。

trans-unit.source: Removes an inhibitor that has been established with gtk_application_inhibit(). Inhibitors are also cleared when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 删除已通过 gtk_application_inhibit() 建立的抑制器。当应用程序退出时，抑制剂也会被清除。

trans-unit.source: Removes an offset marker previously added with gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value().
trans-unit.target: 删除先前用 gtk_level_bar_add_offset_value() 添加的偏移标记。

trans-unit.source: Removes an overlay that was added with gtk_overlay_add_overlay().
trans-unit.target: 删除使用 gtk_overlay_add_overlay() 添加的叠加层。

trans-unit.source: Removes any marks that have been added with gtk_scale_add_mark().
trans-unit.target: 删除已用 gtk_scale_add_mark() 添加的所有标记。

trans-unit.source: Removes any value associated with key . This has the same effect as setting the value to NULL.
trans-unit.target: 删除与 key 关联的任何值。这与将值设置为 NULL 具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: Removes the column from the list of columns of self .
trans-unit.target: 从 self 的列列表中删除该 column 。

trans-unit.source: Removes the page_num ’s page from assistant .
trans-unit.target: 从 assistant 删除 page_num 的页面。

trans-unit.source: Removes the child from the notebook.
trans-unit.target: 把孩子从笔记本上取下来。

trans-unit.source: Removes the closed range [first , last ], so first , last and all values in between. first must be smaller than last .
trans-unit.target: 删除封闭范围[ first ， last ]，因此删除 first ， last 和之间的所有值。 first 必须小于 last 。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current “label-widget”. If label is not NULL, creates a new GtkLabel with that text and adds it as the “label-widget”.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前的“ label-widget”。如果 label 不为 NULL ，则使用该文本创建一个新的GtkLabel并将其添加为“ label-widget”。

trans-unit.source: Removes the filter at the given position from the list of filters used by self . If position is larger than the number of filters, nothing happens and the function returns.
trans-unit.target: 从 self 使用的过滤器列表中删除给定 position 的过滤器。如果 position 大于过滤器的数量，则什么也不会发生，并且该函数将返回。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first message in the GtkStatusbar’s stack with the given context id.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的上下文ID删除GtkStatusbar堆栈中的第一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Removes the given row from the list store. After being removed, iter is set to be the next valid row, or invalidated if it pointed to the last row in list_store .
trans-unit.target: 从列表存储中删除给定的行。删除后，将 iter 设置为下一个有效行，或者如果iter指向 list_store 中的最后一行，则无效。

trans-unit.source: Removes the sorter at the given position from the list of sorter used by self .
trans-unit.target: 从 self 使用的排序器列表中删除给定 position 的排序器。

trans-unit.source: Removes the string at position from combo_box .
trans-unit.target: 从 combo_box 移除 position 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Removes the string at position from self . position must be smaller than the current length of the list.
trans-unit.target: 从 self position 移除字符串。 position 必须小于列表的当前长度。

trans-unit.source: Removes the top element from the stack of render nodes and adds it to the nearest GskGLShaderNode below it. This must be called the same number of times as the number of textures is needed for the shader in gtk_snapshot_push_gl_shader().
trans-unit.target: 从渲染节点堆栈中移除顶部元素，并将其添加到其下方最近的GskGLShaderNode。必须调用此次数与 gtk_snapshot_push_gl_shader() 中的着色器所需的纹理数相同的次数。

trans-unit.source: Removes the top element from the stack of render nodes, and appends it to the node underneath it.
trans-unit.target: 从渲染节点的堆栈中移除顶部元素,并将其附加到其下方的节点。

trans-unit.source: Removes the visual marker from a particular day.
trans-unit.target: 移除某一天的视觉标记。

trans-unit.source: Render nodes belong to the GSK layer, and there are various kinds of them, for the various kinds of drawing primitives you are likely to need when translating widget content and CSS styling. Typical examples are text nodes, gradient nodes, texture nodes or clip nodes.
trans-unit.target: 渲染节点属于GSK层,有各种类型的节点,用于翻译widget内容和CSS样式时可能需要的各种绘图基元。典型的例子是文本节点、渐变节点、纹理节点或剪辑节点。

trans-unit.source: Rendering Areas
trans-unit.target: 渲染区域

trans-unit.source: Renders layout on the coordinates x , y
trans-unit.target: 在坐标 x ， y 上渲染 layout

trans-unit.source: Renders a checkmark (as in a GtkCheckButton).
trans-unit.target: 呈现一个选中标记（如在GtkCheckButton中一样）。

trans-unit.source: Renders a focus indicator on the rectangle determined by x , y , width , height .
trans-unit.target: 在 x ， y ， width ， height 确定的矩形上渲染焦点指示符。

trans-unit.source: Renders a frame around the rectangle defined by x , y , width , height .
trans-unit.target: 围绕由 x ， y ， width ， height 定义的矩形渲染框架。

trans-unit.source: Renders a handle (as in GtkPaned and GtkWindow’s resize grip), in the rectangle determined by x , y , width , height .
trans-unit.target: 在由 x ， y ， width 和 height 确定的矩形中渲染手柄（如GtkPaned和GtkWindow的大小调整手柄）。

trans-unit.source: Renders a line from (x0, y0) to (x1, y1).
trans-unit.target: 渲染从(x0,y0)到(x1,y1)的直线。

trans-unit.source: Renders a page to the preview, using the print context that was passed to the “preview” handler together with preview .
trans-unit.target: 使用传递给“ preview”处理程序和print的打印上下文，将页面呈现为 preview 。

trans-unit.source: Renders an activity indicator (such as in GtkSpinner). The state GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED determines whether there is activity going on.
trans-unit.target: 呈现活动指示器（例如GtkSpinner中的）。状态 GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED 确定是否正在进行活动。

trans-unit.source: Renders an arrow pointing to angle .
trans-unit.target: 渲染一个指向 angle 的箭头。

trans-unit.source: Renders an expander (as used in GtkTreeView and GtkExpander) in the area defined by x , y , width , height . The state GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED determines whether the expander is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 在 x ， y ， width 和 height 定义的区域中渲染一个扩展器（在GtkTreeView和GtkExpander中使用）。状态 GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED 确定扩展器是折叠还是展开。

trans-unit.source: Renders an option mark (as in a radio button), the GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED state will determine whether the option is on or off, and GTK_STATE_FLAG_INCONSISTENT whether it should be marked as undefined.
trans-unit.target: 呈现一个选项标记（如单选按钮一样）， GTK_STATE_FLAG_CHECKED 状态将确定该选项是打开还是关闭，以及 GTK_STATE_FLAG_INCONSISTENT 是否应将其标记为未定义。

trans-unit.source: Renders the background of an element.
trans-unit.target: 渲染一个元素的背景。

trans-unit.source: Renders the icon in texture at the specified x and y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 x 和 y 坐标处以 texture 渲染图标。

trans-unit.source: Reorders store to follow the order indicated by new_order . Note that this function only works with unsorted stores.
trans-unit.target: 重新排序 store 以遵循 new_order 指示的顺序。请注意，此功能仅适用于未排序的商店。

trans-unit.source: Reorders the children of parent in tree_store to follow the order indicated by new_order . Note that this function only works with unsorted stores.
trans-unit.target: 重新排序tree_store中 parent 的 tree_store 以遵循 new_order 指示的顺序。请注意，此功能仅适用于未排序的商店。

trans-unit.source: Reorders the page containing child , so that it appears in position position . If position is greater than or equal to the number of children in the list or negative, child will be moved to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 重新排序包含页面 child ，所以它出现在位置 position 。如果 position 大于或等于列表中的 child 代数或为负，则子代将移动到列表的末尾。
